translations: n．嘲笑，讥讽：对某人或某事的轻蔑或讥讽的言论。
· He made a few twits about my outfit.
他对我的穿着开了几句玩笑。
v．嘲笑，讥讽：用言语或行为轻蔑或讥讽某人或某事。

sentences.sentence: Here are just a few of those twits that had been coming out of the country.
sentences.translation: 这里是一些已经逃离了那个国家的几个人。

sentences.sentence: Following an argu we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  among the Twits is like listening to preschoolers quarreling: You did!
sentences.translation: 在推特里面跟踪一场争论就想在听一场学龄前儿童的争吵：你干了！

sentences.sentence: Don't worry about twits from the middle classes, You should be going straightly ahead, our dear Obama!
sentences.translation: 不要担心中产阶级的反唇相讥，你笔直向前走吧，我们的好奥巴马！
